creditline: The Marilyn C. Benson Endowment for Art Acquisition
description: central roundel of Saint Luke holding the gospel in the form of a scroll with a gray bull at right, set against a verdant landscape and blue sky; framed by elaborate goldwork embroidery of silver- and gilt-thread strapwork terminating in scrolls
title: Embroidered apparel from a dalmatic depicting Saint Luke and the Ox/Bull
